Articles.Content:
with so many mods around now (and peoples computers having diffrent hardware) loading times can either be very large or small. so this idea is to try and beat the loading time of the last person. the person with the longest load time wins. and the person with the shortest time wins. but winners will constantly change because of different cpu loads and crap.

so the winners will have to be updated once a day.

(note you have to post a croped picture in a spoiler with your loading time. this is done by hiting alt+F2 at the title screen just after the game has finished loading)

Longest Loading time Shortest loading time

1 1 Epsilon; 1 part; 1.085943 seconds

2 2

3 3

quick reply luigi but do you have a pic of your load times?

and my load time with 2,999 folders my entry is in the attachment

No I don\'t, sorry.

I\'d rather not go to the bother of booting it up either; it\'s slow as hell and\'d probably take longer than 16 mins to get it done. :C

Beat this

One part in the folder.

Suggestion:

(load time) / (part count) x 100 = points

fewest points = fastest load
